snippet: New York City Ballet performed a program of pieces choreographed by Jerome Robbins, George Balanchine, Christopher Wheeldon and Peter Martins at the David H. Koch Theater on Thursday.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews performance by the New York City Ballet at the David H Koch Theater.
lead_paragraph: New York City Ballet performed a program of pieces choreographed by Jerome Robbins, George Balanchine, Christopher Wheeldon and Peter Martins at the David H. Koch Theater on Thursday.

headline.seo: City Ballet in Varied Works at Koch Theater
headline.main: Myriad Ways for the Facets in the Crown of Ballet to Sparkle and Shine
headline.print_headline: Myriad Ways for the Facets in the Crown of Ballet to Sparkle and Shine
